places_with_reviews.name: Ramdevji Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: 8943+W7C, CS Azad Marg, Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh 457887, India

reviews.text: This is Baba Ramdev Mandir built and operator by my ancestors family "Gorana". This is situated at Alirajpur in MP. Every year on Bhadarwa Sud 10 the Mela is arranged where 1000 of devotee are visiting. Opposite to this Sanatan Ashram is there which started by my father uncle 1008 Maha Mandleawar Swami Narsihanandji. Where round the year his devotee are visiting and on every Poonam they visit in mass.
Must Visit To Get Blessing in Your life
Newly constructed masajid..and work of minara is going on..niely decorated during festival times.
It is a very big masjid and very biutyfull

places_with_reviews.name: Ancient Shiva temple alirajpur
places_with_reviews.address: 788X+443, GJ SH 11, Indarsing Ki Choki, Malwai, Madhya Pradesh 457893, India

reviews.text: This temple is an ancient temple built around 14th century CE in Paramara style. The temple is standing on a platform where benches has been placed so that visitors can sit. The temple is a quite place, surrounded by lush green trees and crops. The temple has beautiful carved mouldings and the superstructure is built in typical Bhumija shikhar. A well and a handpump is also there in the complex. If someone is interested in seeing old, beautiful intricate craftsmanship this temple should be in their bucket list.

places_with_reviews.name: MARKAZ MASJID ALIRAJPUR Kumharwada

places_with_reviews.name: Shri Charbhuja Nath Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: B25, Keshav Nagar, Alirajpur, Madhya Pradesh 457887, India

reviews.text:
Shree charbhujanath ji temple
Shree Charbhujanath ji is present in the middle along with the idol of Shri Radha Krishna ji and the statue of Shree Lakshmi Mata.
He got very beautiful and beautiful darshan.
Every year, Chappan Bhog and Bhandara is also organized here. From the side of Shree Bade Hanuman he reached the mountain where this temple resides.
